duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain operational databases, ensuring performance, availability, and security.
Provide database solutions for complex business issues and data processing.
Diagnose and resolve database issues, including storage, performance, and security.
Automate database management, maintenance, and data processing activities.
Create, maintain, and optimize database objects such as indexes, tables, triggers, and stored procedures.
Evaluate business needs, perform feasibility analysis, and determine project scope for database development.
Evaluate and deploy database solutions in AWS and Azure environments.
Collaborate with technical and non-technical resources for project work and troubleshooting.
Analyze operating system statistics and troubleshoot performance-related problems.
Adapt new automation technologies and implement them effectively.
Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation and escalate issues as needed.
Document processes related to database design, configuration, and performance.
Monitor and analyze APM Monitoring tools for database performance.
Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or other technical discipline (Technical Certifications are a plus)
